about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Computer Science Student
about.description: I am a third-year student studying computer science with a focus on networks and telecommunications, specialising in security, at the Haute École en Hainaut at Mons, Belgium. I am passionate about programmable infrastructure, networks and UNIX systems.
